channel.title: Github on SA Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Github on SA Dev

item.title: Github commits' emails change
item.description: Abstract You know that Contributions panel on your Github profile page. Let’s face it, developers these day take much pride when they can show their consistent work and progress of their own/forked repositories…even when some of their commits are nothing more than a implementations of a single function. Said panel is clear indication to you, future employee or members of your ‘coding community’ that you are pretty much a big deal with a good work ethic.
